mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rn , tt.* from( select menteeboard_seq,menteeboard_profile,menteeboard_nickname,menteeboard_email,menteeboard_title,menteeboard_content, j.job_type, menteeboard_good,menteeboard_ref,menteeboard_lev,menteeboard_step,menteeboard_pseq,menteeboard_reply,menteeboard_hit,menteeboard_logtime from menteeboard a, job j where a.job_code = j.job_code order by menteeboard_seq desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}

select * from ( select rownum rn , tt.* from (select menteeboard_seq,menteeboard_profile,menteeboard_nickname,menteeboard_email,menteeboard_title,menteeboard_content, j.job_type, menteeboard_good,menteeboard_ref,menteeboard_lev,menteeboard_step,menteeboard_pseq,menteeboard_reply,menteeboard_hit,menteeboard_logtime from (select * from menteeboard order by menteeboard_seq desc)m, job j where m.job_code = #{job_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m.job_code = j.job_code)tt) where rn >= #{startNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} and rn <= #{endNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select count(*) from menteeboardLike where menteeboardLike_mb_seq = #{menteeboardLike_mb_seq} AND menteeboardLike_mb_email = #{menteeboardLike_mb_email}
